member.remarks: Retrieve all Candidate information stored in the system.

member.remarks: Retrieve a Candidates information by their Candidate ID.

member.name: M:Job_Board.Controllers.CandidateController.UpdateCandidateByID(Job_Board.Models.Candidate)
member.remarks: Modify an existing candidate's information by their Candidate ID.
